summary: REQ-2 (frontend onboarding error handling) appears implemented in `frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts` by mapping authorization-related backend errors to friendly English messages and avoiding exposing the raw backend string. REQ-1 (backend onboarding role assignment fix) is not evidenced in the provided truncated `backend/main.mo` diff. Additionally, the diff summary indicates multiple unrelated frontend changes and modifications to files that were explicitly constrained as immutable.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix backend onboarding so a normal user completing onboarding with a valid invite token can be assigned the `#user` role without requiring admin privileges, and without trapping with `Unauthorized: Only admins can assign user roles`. Keep existing allowlisted first-admin claim behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided `backend/main.mo` diff excerpt shows new helper functions (e.g., `hasAdminPermission`) and existing admin checks (e.g., `generateInviteCode`), but does not include any visible change to `completeOnboarding` logic or role assignment that would prevent the `Only admins can assign user roles` trap for normal users. Because the relevant section is truncated, there is insufficient evidence the requirement is implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend immutable files that were explicitly constrained as 'Do not modify' (at least `frontend/src/main.tsx` and `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints prohibit changes to these paths, but the diff summary text indicates they were changed.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated frontend feature additions/changes (e.g., new /vehicle-check route, About page, navigation/menu updates, PWA/service worker/manifest updates, i18n provider integration, admin dashboard/invite-token management UI work).
hallucinated_features.reason: These features are not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2 and are outside the stated scope (only onboarding authorization + onboarding error message mapping).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (multiple entries describing new routes/pages/PWA/i18n/admin UI changes)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated URL parameter + sessionStorage utilities in `frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts` beyond onboarding error handling.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 only asks to update onboarding error handling messages; URL param persistence utilities are not requested in the BuildRequest.
